Napier Megafish: Four men rescued from sinking boat after hitting log https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-megafish-four-men-rescued-from-sinking-boat-after-hitting-log/LXLHJX4X2RBN7OCN4UWEZE3IKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-megafish-four-men-rescued-from-sinking-boat-after-hitting-log/LXLHJX4X2RBN7OCN4UWEZE3IKM/ Doug Laing'It all happened very fast', says the fishing club manager of boaties' rescue. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 08:06:18 +0000 Four men have been rescued after their boat hit a log and sank within a few hundred metres of the Port of Napier this afternoon.
Air New Zealand flight forced to divert to Guam due to ‘electrical smell’ on plane https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-forced-to-divert-to-guam-due-to-electrical-smell-on-plane/LA24R7SX7FH53P3EVE7TDW2UQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-forced-to-divert-to-guam-due-to-electrical-smell-on-plane/LA24R7SX7FH53P3EVE7TDW2UQ4/ Passengers were forced to wait on the plane for five hours. Op Maddale sentencing: Christchurch man Charlie Tereora travelled NZ for meth syndicate https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/op-maddale-sentencing-christchurch-man-charlie-tereora-travelled-nz-for-meth-syndicate/XYZPZR7VOBE6TAO2JC7WZ2TEUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/op-maddale-sentencing-christchurch-man-charlie-tereora-travelled-nz-for-meth-syndicate/XYZPZR7VOBE6TAO2JC7WZ2TEUM/ Craig KapitanThe church-going defendant “holds himself up as an example of what can go wrong”. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Police initially arrested 10 people and seized over a million dollars in cash and assets in August 2019 at the conclusion of Operation Maddale, which targeted the supply and distribution of methamphetamine. Twenty-one people were eventually charged.
